description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Block BUSTER is inspired by the old classics from the 70's.  Knock out the blocks in vivid 3D.  Experience over 20 challenging levels for hours of game play.  Choose from 3 difficulty levels for the best experience.  This is my Tribute to the great legacies of gaming!
